body:
Comment 1026 by **sargavarju**: 
comments 953 and 1026

observe, that you akso need to speak, not only write
if "Go" != "Go!"
then "chess" != "ches"
and "guns" != "gunz"
and "fuck" != "f!uck" != "fsck"
and "u bich" != "you bitch"

please grow up, and choose a mature name with a mature procedure.
